name: 張裕煦
objective: 探討有關無機物質的化學性質、原子結構及化學反應，及其實際應用層面。
schedule:
1-3 週   chapter 1. Atomic structure
3-5 週   chapter 2. Molecular structure and bonding
exam 1
6-8 週   chapter 3. The structures of simple solids
8-10 週  chapter 4. Acids and bases
exam 2
11-13 週 chapter 5. Oxidation and reduction
13-15 週 chapter 6. Molecular symmetry
exam 3
16-18 週 chapter 7. An introduction to coordination compounds
final
scorePolicy:
The final grade will be determined by:
25 % exam 1 + 25 % exam 2 + 25 % exam 3 + 25 % final + attendance
materials:
Inorganic chemistry  
OXFORD 6th edition
Weller, Overton, Rourke, and Armstrong
